DOC.brief_summary: This study involves the comparison of two treatment approaches for patients with chronic pain who are entering methadone maintenance treatment (MMT) for opioid addiction: (a) an integrated counseling that addresses both chronic pain and opioid dependence(POD)and (b) a counseling intervention that addresses opioid dependence only.
DOC.brief_title: Cognitive-Behavioral Therapy for Pain and Opioid Dependence in Methadone Maintenance Treatment
DOC.criteria: 18 years of age or older prescription opioid or heroin addiction moderate to severe chronic pain enrolled in methadone maintenance at the APT Foundation for opioid addiction understand English current suicide or homicide risk lifethreatening or unstable medical problem
